alert.note: Alert for Northern Oxford; Southern Oxford (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 19 at 8:16PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...An area of heavy snow showers will affect southwestern Oxford... southern Coos and northeastern Carroll Counties... At 815 PM EST...An area of heavy snow showers was along a line extending from near Guildhall VT to near Waterford ME. The area of heavy snow showers was nearly stationary. Locations impacted include... Berlin, Lancaster, Fryeburg, Bethel, Waterford, Pinkham Notch, Mount Washington, Carroll, Gorham, Lovell, Jefferson, Dalton, Greenwood, Jackson, Chatham, Gilead, West Paris, Whitefield, Northumberland, and Sweden. This also includes... Mount Jefferson, Mount Madison, Wildcat Mountain, Speckled Mountain, and Carter Notch. * Visibilities will drop quickly to less than a half mile in this area of heavy snow showers. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
